TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConfigurationLockCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class ConfigurationLockCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class ConfigurationLockCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type ConfigurationLockCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Contains a collection of locked configuration objects. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks In a configuration file, a configuration section contains both attributes and elements. A <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection> collection exists for the locked attributes of a configuration section, and is accessed through the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAttributes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> class. Another <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection> collection exists for the locked elements of a configuration section, and is accessed through the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockElements%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> class.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection> type.
[!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection/CS/ConfigurationLockCollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection/VB/ConfigurationLockCollection.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the configuration object.
Docs.summary: Locks a configuration object by adding it to the collection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Adding a configuration object to the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection> collection specifies that the configuration object is locked and cannot be modified until it has been removed from the collection.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection.Add%2A> method. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection> class.

Docs.exception: Occurs when the does not match an existing configuration object within the collection.
